name: Jacob Nel
description:
I am calm person and I do not speak too much only when I need to but, I have very good sense of humor. I almost never loose my temper and I am somewhat emotional and romantic. Sometimes, I like to take risks. I like traditions, but I don’t care some traditions and I care, about religion, but I do not practice. I like all kind of animals; I use to have dogs when I was kid. I don’t gamble, I do not smoke and I am social drinker. I am ambitions, never gave up, strong, artistic style, genius and successful at work, but people say I do not look typical business man.
I am a kind and caring person, who is looking for the love of his life. I believe that I have come to the right place. I love to go the movies and watch tv at home. I read a lot. I play Golf and go to the Mall to watch movies. I love to play tennis and be near to water. I love to cook and try new recipes.
I want to meet the woman which ready for serious relation, to create family and spend all life together. I must be sure in my woman, he must be kind, open and calm person. I want to find a woman, strong, wise, brave, with whom I could feel save, I want to love and could feel loved.
